title: 3 good reasons
creator_contributor_role: National Heart Foundation of Australia. Victorian Division, funding
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
abstract: Why would someone work for the Heart Foundation? Here's three good reasons'
description: David Hunt is a volunteer for the Heart Foundation. He speaks of his own personal tragedies and how these particular events have motivated him to dedicate his time to the Heart Foundation. Made as part of 'The Heart of the Story' in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
